definition: to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: The water intake is internally mounted.
sentences.chinese: 進水口是安裝在裏面的。

sentences.english: Not dry completely, if the sources of the inlet of water are kept open.
sentences.chinese: 不把進水口堵住的話，池塘中的水永遠也不會乾涸。

sentences.english: The water inlet of the toilet is communicated with a tap water pipe through a valve.
sentences.chinese: 所述坐便器的進水口通過閥門與自來水管連通。
